Properties.Description: Range at which the glow becomes visible. (0 = always visible)
Range at which the glow stops being visible. (0 = always visible)
Change the render color of the glow.
Change the team we glow for.
Distance at which the prop starts to fade (<0 = subtract from fademaxdist).
Max fade distance at which the prop is visible (0 = don't fade out)
Some models have multiple versions of their textures, called skins.
Used to disable shadow casting from this entity.
Will add an additional attribute that AI/player entities can query when checking props for information (ex: 'DogToy' or 'GrabbableResource')
Will add this modifier when the entity spawns.

Name by which this entity is linked to another entity in a different map. When the player transitions to a new map, entities in the new map with globalnames matching entities in the previous map will have the previous map's state copied over their state.
The name of this entity's parent in the movement hierarchy. Entities with parents move with their parent.

The name of the bone or attachment to attach to on the entity's parent in the movement hierarchy. Use !bonemerge to use bone-merge style attachment. NOTE: If this is specified the Hammer transform will be disregarded, even if 'Use Local Transform' is NOT specified (in that case local transform will be identity)
Whether to respect the specified local offset when doing the initial hierarchical attachment to its parent.
Offset in the local space of the parent model's attachment/bone to use in hierarchy. Not used if you are not using parent attachment.
Angular offset in the local space of the parent model's attachment/bone to use in hierarchy. Not used if you are not using parent attachment.
Scale in the local space of the parent model's attachment/bone to use in hierarchy. Not used if you are not using parent attachment.
Name(s) of script files that are executed after all entities have spawned.
The name that other entities refer to this entity by.
The name of any doors that should be slaved to this door (i.e. should open when this one opens, and close when this one closes).
If the door 'Spawn Position' is set to Ajar, this is the angle to spawn at, relative to the closed position.
By default, Ajar doors always open fully when +USEd. If this is set to true, Ajar doors will stop opening if they cross the close position.
The amount, in degrees, that the door should rotate when opened.
The speed at which the door moves.
Sound played when the door has finished opening.
Sound played when the door has finished closing.
Sound played when the door starts to move.
Sound played when the player tries to move the door while the latch is engaged.
Amount of time, in seconds, after the door has opened before it closes. If the value is set to -1, the door never closes itself.
Amount of damage done to entities that block the movement of this door, per frame.
Sound played when the player tries to open the door, and fails because it's locked.
Sound played when the door is unlocked.
Sound played when the door's latch is engaged.
If set, this door will close no matter what. Useful for doors that have to close even if the player tries to block them with objects.
If true, this geometry renders into baked cube maps
Determines if this geometry be considered static & cast shadows/bounce light when baking lightmaps?

Options.Name: Door silent (No sound, and does not alert NPCs)
Door silent to NPCS (Does not alert NPCs)

Properties.Description: Force the door to open only forwards or only backwards. Both directions is the standard door behavior.
The damage filter associated with this place.

InputOutputs.Name: StartGlowing
InputOutputs.Description: Turn on a permanent glow effect for this prop.

InputOutputs.Name: StopGlowing
InputOutputs.Description: Turn off this prop's glow effect.

InputOutputs.Name: Skin
InputOutputs.Description: Changes the model skin to the specified number.

InputOutputs.Name: DisableShadow
InputOutputs.Description: Turn shadow off.

InputOutputs.Name: EnableShadow
InputOutputs.Description: Turn shadow on.

InputOutputs.Name: AlternativeSorting
InputOutputs.Description: Used to attempt to fix sorting problems when rendering. True activates, false deactivates

InputOutputs.Name: SetRenderAttribute
InputOutputs.Description: Set the value of a render attribute used in material dynamic expressions. Examples: $myfloat=0.25 $myfloat4=1.0,0.0,1.0,1.0

InputOutputs.Name: ClearRenderAttribute
InputOutputs.Description: Remove a render attribute previously set by SetRenderAttribute, restoring it to its previous value.

InputOutputs.Name: OnIgnite
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this object catches fire.

InputOutputs.Name: SetParent
InputOutputs.Description: Changes the entity's parent in the movement hierarchy.

InputOutputs.Name: SetParentAttachment
InputOutputs.Description: Change this entity to attach to a specific attachment point on its parent. Entities must be parented before being sent this input. The parameter passed in should be the name of the attachment.

InputOutputs.Name: SetParentAttachmentMaintainOffset
InputOutputs.Description: Change this entity to attach to a specific attachment point on it's parent. Entities must be parented before being sent this input. The parameter passed in should be the name of the attachment. The entity will maintain it's position relative to the parent at the time it is attached.

InputOutputs.Name: ClearParent
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity from the the movement hierarchy, leaving it free to move independently.

InputOutputs.Name: FollowEntity
InputOutputs.Description: Bone merges this entity to a parent entity. Call again passing nothing to end the bone merge.

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptFile
InputOutputs.Description: Load and execute a script file

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptCode
InputOutputs.Description: Execute a fragment of script code

InputOutputs.Name: CallScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Call a script function

InputOutputs.Name: CallPrivateScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function from this entity's private script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: CallGlobalScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function in the global script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: Kill
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillHierarchy
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity and all its children from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillConstrained
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity, all its children, and anything constrained to it, from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: AddOutput
InputOutputs.Description: Adds an entity I/O connection to this entity. Parameter format: outputname>targetname>inputname>parameter>delay>max times to fire (-1 == infinite). Very dangerous, use with care.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser1 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser2 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser3 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser4 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser1 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser2 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser3 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser4 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnKilled
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the entity is killed and removed from the game. Parameter is the inflictor.

InputOutputs.Name: OnClose
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the door is told to close.

InputOutputs.Name: OnOpen
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the door is told to open.

InputOutputs.Name: OnFullyOpen
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the door reaches the fully open position.

InputOutputs.Name: OnAjarOpen
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the door is ajar and told to open.

InputOutputs.Name: OnFullyClosed
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the door reaches the fully closed position.

InputOutputs.Name: OnBlockedClosing
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the door is blocked while closing.

InputOutputs.Name: OnBlockedOpening
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the door is blocked while opening.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUnblockedClosing
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the door is unblocked while closing.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUnblockedOpening
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the door is unblocked while opening.

InputOutputs.Name: OnLockedUse
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the player uses the door, but it is locked.

InputOutputs.Name: Open
InputOutputs.Description: Open the door, if it is not fully open.

InputOutputs.Name: OpenAwayFrom
InputOutputs.Description: Open the door away from the specified entity.

InputOutputs.Name: Close
InputOutputs.Description: Close the door, if it is not fully closed.

InputOutputs.Name: Toggle
InputOutputs.Description: Toggle the door between open and closed.

InputOutputs.Name: Lock
InputOutputs.Description: Lock the door.

InputOutputs.Name: Unlock
InputOutputs.Description: Unlock the door.

InputOutputs.Name: SetRotationDistance
InputOutputs.Description: Set the distance (in degrees) between Open and Closed.

InputOutputs.Name: SetSpeed
InputOutputs.Description: Set the speed at which the door rotates. 100 is default.

InputOutputs.Name: SetNoNPCs
InputOutputs.Description: Set whether NPCs can use this door or not.
